mapper.select: SELECT division_code AS divisionCode , dept_code AS deptCode , dept_name AS deptName FROM department WHERE division_code LIKE #{divisionCode}

SELECT DISTINCT e1.emp_no AS empNo, e1.emp_name AS empName, e1.rank_no AS rankNo, e1.dept_code AS deptCode, DENSE_RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY e1.dept_code ORDER BY e1.rank_no DESC) AS depth FROM employee e1 WHERE e1.dept_code = #{deptCode} ORDER BY depth
